summary: Passionate AI/ML and Data Science enthusiast with hands-on experience in machine learning, data analysis, and web development. Currently a final year student with expertise in building intelligent systems and optimizing machine learning workflows, with a focus on computer vision, NLP, and AI-driven automation. projects.title: Image to Sketch using Deep Neural Network and ML
projects.description: Developed a deep learning model using the CUHK Face Sketch Database, achieving an 85% quality enhancement through a CNN in TensorFlow. Integrated GANs and Autoencoders for 90% accuracy, maintaining details via Residual Blocks and Batch Normalization. Used transfer learning and adaptive optimization to improve processing speed by 30%.

projects.title: Endoscopy Image Enhancement
projects.description: Advanced medical imaging enhancement system using deep learning for improved endoscopic visualization and diagnosis accuracy. Developed specialized algorithms for medical image processing and enhancement.

projects.title: Digit Classifier using Deep Learning
projects.description: A modern web-based digit recognition application that uses Deep Learning to classify handwritten digits. Built with Next.js, FastAPI, and TensorFlow for real-time digit recognition with 99% accuracy.

projects.title: Collaborative Research Hub
projects.description: A comprehensive real-time collaborative workspace designed for research teams, integrating advanced AI capabilities with robust team collaboration features. Features real-time document editing and AI-powered research assistance.

projects.title: Artify AI - Image to Oil Paint
projects.description: AI-powered art transformation system that converts photographs into stunning oil painting style artworks using neural style transfer techniques. Supports multiple artistic styles with optimized processing.

projects.title: Predictive Maintenance with Machine Learning
projects.description: Developed an interactive machine learning education platform that integrates structured learning paths, engaging demonstrations, and real-time parameter adjustments to enhance user engagement. Introduced dynamic model comparison and visualization features, allowing learners to evaluate different machine learning techniques side by side while modifying parameters.
